mission.posting: Join the conjoint op "TakeDown" with fSociety to shutdown the ECorp network

email.subject: RE: OP TakeDown - First Contact SUCCESS
email.body:
Congratz #PLAYERNAME#,
Our system has detected a copy of "home/target.txt" let's hope you're the right person... The next mail you're about to receive will give you further information. Welcome to fSociety...
-fSociety
